task_units.name: Search for flights between two locations
Filter flight search results
sub_actions: SELECT filter criteria (e.g., non-stop, airline, price)

task_units.name: Select flight dates
sub_actions: SELECT return date from calendar (if applicable)

task_units.name: Choose flight class
sub_actions: SELECT desired flight class (e.g., economy, premium economy, business, first)

task_units.name: View and compare flight options
sub_actions: COMPARE flight details (e.g., price, duration, stops)

task_units.name: Check flight status
sub_actions: TYPE flight number or route details
CLICK on search or check status button

task_units.name: Book a flight
sub_actions: CLICK on book or select button
PROCEED to checkout or payment page

task_units.name: Apply promo code or discounts
sub_actions: CLICK on promo code input field

task_units.name: Manage booking or check-in
sub_actions: CLICK on manage booking or check-in section
TYPE booking reference or ticket number
CLICK on search or find booking button
